block.torchmaster.megatorch.tooltip: Prevents natural spawning of hostile monsters in a big radius around the torch
block.torchmaster.dreadlamp.tooltip: Prevents natural spawning of passive animals like squids, bats or ocelots in a big radius around the lamp
command.torchmaster.torch_list.completed: Torches have been dumped to the log file
command.torchmaster.entity_dump.complete: Entities have been dumped to the log file
item.torchmaster.frozen_pearl.tooltip: Clears residual lights from a Feral Flare Lantern
text.config.torchmaster-config.option.fe: How often the lantern should attempt to place lights
Feral Flare Lantern Light hard cap
How many lights the feral lantern is allowed to place in total. Don't set this too high or you may corrupt your world.
The circular radius in which the lantern should place lights
Feral Flare Lantern Minimum Light Level
The minimum light level before attempting to place a light
text.config.torchmaster-config.option.bl: If disabled, the megatorch and dreadlamp will prevent spawns from minecraft spawners.
Megatorch will prevent village sieges by zombies if enabled
text.config.torchmaster-config.option.me: See Torchmaster Wiki on Github for details
text.config.torchmaster-config.option.dr: See Torchmaster Wiki on Github for details
